LoadingDialogContentInfo.message:
Some of the plugins you have installed through Dalamud are taking a long time to load.
This is likely normal, please wait a little while longer.

LoadingDialogContentTakingTooLong.message: It's been a while now. Please report this issue on our Discord server.

DateTimeSpanExtensions.RelativeFormatStr.message:
172800,{0:%d} days ago
86400,yesterday
7200,{0:%h} hours ago
3600,an hour ago
120,{0:%m} minutes ago
60,a minute ago
2,{0:%s} seconds ago
1,a second ago
-Infinity,just now

PluginCommandsFailed.message: Plugin "{0}" has previously failed to load/unload, not continuing.

PluginCommandsNotInDefaultProfile.message: Plugin "{0}" is in a collection and can't be managed through commands. Manage the collection instead.

ProfileCommandsApplyFailed.message: Failed to apply your collections. Please check the console for errors.

PluginCommandsEnableFailed.message: Failed to enable plugin "{0}". Please check the console for errors.

PluginCommandsDisableFailed.message: Failed to disable plugin "{0}". Please check the console for errors.

AutoUpdateUpdatesSuccessfulContent.message: All plugins have been updated successfully.

AutoUpdateUpdatesFailedContent.message: Some plugins failed to update. Please check the plugin installer for more information.

AutoUpdateUpdatesAvailableContentPlural.message: There are {0} plugins that can be updated:

AutoUpdateUpdatesAvailableContentSingula.message: There is a plugin that can be updated:

WindowSystemContextActionPinHint.message: Pinned windows will not move or resize when you click and drag them, nor will they close when escape is pressed.

WindowSystemContextActionClickthroughHin.message: Clickthrough windows will not receive mouse input, move or resize. They are completely inert.

WindowSystemContextActionClickthroughDis.message: Open this menu again by clicking the three dashes to disable clickthrough.

WindowSystemContextActionViewportDisclai.message: These features are only available if this window is inside the game window.

DalamudUnloadHelp.message: Unloads XIVLauncher in-game addon. For debug use only!

DalamudCmdInfoHelp.message: Shows list of commands available. If an argument is provided, shows help for that command.

DalamudMuteHelp.message: Mute a word or sentence from appearing in chat. Usage: /xlmute <word or sentence>

DalamudUnmuteHelp.message: Unmute a word or sentence. Usage: /xlunmute <word or sentence>

DalamudLastLinkHelp.message: Open the last posted link in your default browser.

DalamudBgmSetHelp.message: Set the Game background music. Usage: /xlbgmset <BGM ID>

DalamudDevDataMenuHelp.message: Draw dev data menu DEBUG. Usage: /xldata [Data Dropdown Type]

DalamudLanguageHelp.message: Set the language for Dalamud and plugins that support it. Available languages:

DalamudSettingsHelp.message: Change various In-Game-Addon settings like chat channels and the discord bot setup.

DalamudUiModeHelp.message: Toggle Dalamud UI display modes. Native UI modifications may also be affected by this, but that depends on the plugin.

DalamudCopyLogHelp.message: Copy the dalamud.log file to your clipboard.

DalamudMuteListDeprecation.message: The built-in Dalamud bad word list is deprecated and no new words can be added. Please use a plugin for this functionality.

DalamudLogCopyFailure.message: Could not copy log file to clipboard.

ImGuiClipboardFunctionProviderClipboardI.message: Some other application is using the clipboard. Try again later.

ImGuiClipboardFunctionProviderErrorCopy.message: Failed to copy. See logs for details.

ImGuiClipboardFunctionProviderErrorPaste.message: Failed to paste. See logs for details.

ReShadeNoAddonSupportNotificationContent.message:
Your installation of ReShade does not have full addon support, and may not work with Dalamud and/or the game.
Download and install ReShade with full addon-support.

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateHint.message: Dalamud can update your plugins automatically, making sure that you always have the newest features and bug fixes. You can choose when and how auto-updates are run here.

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateDisclaimer1.message: You can always update your plugins manually by clicking the update button in the plugin list. You can also opt into updates for specific plugins by right-clicking them and selecting "Always auto-update".

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateDisclaimer2.message: Dalamud will only notify you about updates while you are idle.

DalamudGamepadModeNotifierText.message: Gamepad mode is ON. Press L1+L3 to deactivate, press R3 to toggle PluginInstaller.

StyleEditorCopy.message: Copy style to clipboard for sharing

StyleEditorNotAllowed.message: You cannot edit built-in styles. Please add a new style first.

StyleEditorEnterName.message: Please enter the new name for this style.

DalamudSettingsDevPluginLocationsHint.message:
Add dev plugin load locations.
This must be a path to the plugin DLL.

DalamudDevPluginInvalid.message:
The entered value is not a valid path to a potential Dev Plugin.
Did you mean to enter it as a custom plugin repository in the fields below instead?

DalamudSettingsLanguageHint.message: Select the language Dalamud will be displayed in.

DalamudSettingCustomRepoWarning.message: We cannot take any responsibility for custom plugins and repositories.

DalamudSettingCustomRepoWarning5.message: If someone told you to copy/paste something here, it's very possible that you are being scammed or taken advantage of.

DalamudSettingCustomRepoWarning2.message: Plugins have full control over your PC, like any other program, and may cause harm or crashes.

DalamudSettingCustomRepoWarning4.message: They can delete your character, steal your FC or Discord account, and burn down your house.

DalamudSettingCustomRepoWarning3.message: Please make absolutely sure that you only install plugins from developers you trust.

DalamudSettingCustomRepoWarningIReadIt.message: Ok, I have read and understood this warning

DalamudThirdRepoNotUrl.message:
The entered address is not a valid URL.
Did you mean to enter it as a DevPlugin in the fields above instead?

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateNone.message: Do not check for updates automatically

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateNotify.message: Only notify me of new updates

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateAllWarning.message:
Warning: This will update all plugins, including those not from the main repository.
These updates are not reviewed by the Dalamud team and may contain malicious code.

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateDisabledPlugins.message: Auto-Update plugins that are currently disabled

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateChatMessage.message: Show notification about updates available in chat

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdatePeriodically.message: Periodically check for new updates while playing

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdatePeriodicallyHin.message: Plugins won't update automatically after startup, you will only receive a notification while you are not actively playing.

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateOverrideHint.message: Here, you can choose to receive or not to receive updates for specific plugins. This will override the settings above for the selected plugins.

DalamudSettingsAutoUpdateOptedInHint2.message: You don't have auto-update rules for any plugins.

DalamudSettingServerInfoBarHint.message:
Plugins can put additional information into your server information bar(where world & time can be seen).
You can reorder and disable these here.

DalamudSettingServerInfoBarDidNone.message: You have no plugins that use this feature.

DalamudSettingServerInfoBarSpacingHint.message: Configure the amount of space between entries in the server info bar here.

DalamudSettingServerInfoBarDirectionHint.message: If checked, the Server Info Bar elements will expand to the right instead of the left.

DalamudSettingsPluginTestHint.message:
Receive testing prereleases for selected plugins.
To opt-in to testing builds for a plugin, you have to right click it in the "Installed Plugins" tab of the plugin installer and select "Receive plugin testing versions".

DalamudSettingsPluginTestWarning.message: Testing plugins may contain bugs or crash your game. Please only enable this if you are aware of the risks.

DalamudSettingsClearHiddenHint.message: Restore plugins you have previously hidden from the plugin installer.

DalamudSettingEnableImGuiAssertsHint.message:
If this setting is enabled, a window containing further details will be shown when an internal assertion in ImGui fails.
We recommend enabling this when developing plugins. This setting does not persist and will reset when the game restarts.
Use the setting below to enable it at startup.

DalamudSettingEnableImGuiAssertsAtStartu.message: Always enable ImGui asserts at startup
This will enable ImGui asserts every time the game starts.

DalamudSettingsReShadeHandlingModeHint.message:
You may try different options to work around problems you may encounter.
Restart is required for changes to take effect.

DalamudSettingsChannelHint.message: Select the chat channel that is to be used for general Dalamud messages.

DalamudSettingsWaitForPluginsOnStartup.message: Wait for plugins before game loads

DalamudSettingsWaitForPluginsOnStartupHi.message: Do not let the game load, until plugins are loaded.

DalamudSettingsFlash.message: Flash FFXIV window on duty pop

DalamudSettingsFlashHint.message: Flash the FFXIV window in your task bar when a duty is ready.

DalamudSettingsDutyFinderMessageHint.message: Send a message in FFXIV chat when a duty is ready.

DalamudSettingsPrintDalamudWelcomeMsgHin.message: Display Dalamud's welcome message in FFXIV chat when logging in with a character.

DalamudSettingsPrintPluginsWelcomeMsg.message: Display loaded plugins in the welcome message

DalamudSettingsPrintPluginsWelcomeMsgHin.message: Display loaded plugins in FFXIV chat when logging in with a character.

DalamudSettingsSystemMenuMsgHint.message: Add buttons for Dalamud plugins and settings to the system menu.

DalamudSettingDoMbCollectHint.message: Anonymously provide data about in-game economics to Universalis when browsing the market board. This data can't be tied to you in any way and everyone benefits!

DalamudSettingsGlobalUiScaleHint.message: Scale text in all XIVLauncher UI elements - this is useful for 4K displays.

DalamudSettingsFontBuildFaulted.message: Failed to load fonts as requested.

DalamudSettingsStyleEditorHint.message: Modify the look & feel of Dalamud windows.

DalamudSettingsNotificationEditorHint.message: Choose where Dalamud notifications appear on the screen.

DalamudSettingsUseDarkModeHint.message: This will cause the FFXIV window title bar to follow your preferred Windows color settings, and switch to dark mode if enabled.

DalamudSettingToggleUiHideOptOutNote.message: Plugins may independently opt out of the settings below.

DalamudSettingToggleUiHide.message: Hide plugin UI when the game UI is toggled off

DalamudSettingToggleUiHideHint.message: Hide any open windows by plugins when toggling the game overlay.

DalamudSettingToggleUiHideDuringCutscene.message: Hide any open windows by plugins during cutscenes.

DalamudSettingToggleUiHideDuringGpose.message: Hide plugin UI while gpose is active

DalamudSettingToggleUiHideDuringGposeHin.message: Hide any open windows by plugins while gpose is active.

DalamudSettingToggleFocusManagement.message: Use escape to close Dalamud windows

DalamudSettingToggleFocusManagementHint.message:
This will cause Dalamud windows to behave like in-game windows when pressing escape.
They will close one after another until all are closed. May not work for all plugins.

DalamudSettingToggleViewportsHint.message:
This will allow you move plugin windows onto other monitors.
Will only work in Borderless Window or Windowed mode.

DalamudSettingToggleDockingHint.message: This will allow you to fuse and tab plugin windows.

DalamudSettingEnablePluginUIAdditionalOp.message: Add a button to the title bar of plugin windows to open additional options

This will allow you to pin certain plugin windows, make them clickthrough or adjust their opacity.
This may not be supported by all of your plugins. Contact the plugin author if you want them to support this feature.

DalamudSettingEnablePluginUISoundEffects.message: Enable sound effects for plugin windows

This will allow you to enable or disable sound effects generated by plugin user interfaces.
This is affected by your in-game `System Sounds` volume settings.

DalamudSettingToggleGamepadNavigationHin.message:
This will allow you to toggle between game and plugin navigation via L1+L3.
Toggle the PluginInstaller window via R3 if ImGui navigation is enabled.

DalamudSettingToggleTsmHint.message:
This will allow you to access certain Dalamud and Plugin functionality from the title screen.
Disabling this will also hide the Dalamud version text on the title screen.

DalamudSettingInstallerOpenDefault.message: Open the Plugin Installer to the "Installed Plugins" tab by default

DalamudSettingInstallerOpenDefaultHint.message: This will allow you to open the Plugin Installer to the "Installed Plugins" tab by default, instead of the "Available Plugins" tab.

DalamudSettingReducedMotionHint.message: This will suppress certain animations from Dalamud, such as the notification popup.

DalamudSettingImeStateIndicatorOpacityHi.message: When any of CJK IMEs is in use, the state of IME will be shown with the opacity specified here.

InstallerHint.message:
This window allows you to install and remove Dalamud plugins.
They are made by the community.

InstallerSafeMode.message: Dalamud is running in Plugin Safe Mode, restart to activate plugins.

InstallerNoPluginsTesting.message:
You aren't testing any plugins at the moment!
You can opt in to testing versions in the plugin context menu.

InstallerNoPluginsInstalled.message:
You don't have any plugins installed yet!
You can install them from the "{0}" tab.

InstallerNoPluginsAvailable.message: No plugins are available at the moment.

InstallerNoPluginsUpdate.message: No plugins have updates available at the moment.

InstallerNoPluginsDev.message: You don't have any dev plugins. Add them from the settings.

InstallerNoMatching.message: No plugins were found matching your search.

InstallerNoCompatible.message: No compatible plugins were found :( Please restart your game and try again.

InstallerNoInstalled.message: No plugins are currently installed. You can install them from the "All Plugins" tab.

InstallerNoChangelog.message: None of your installed plugins have a changelog.

InstallerOutdatedPluginBody.message: This plugin is outdated and incompatible.

InstallerIncompatiblePluginBody.message: This plugin is incompatible with your version of Dalamud. Please attempt to restart your game.

InstallerOutdatedWaitForUpdate.message: Please wait for it to be updated by its author.

InstallerOutdatedCanNowUpdate.message: An update is available for installation.

InstallerOrphanedPluginBody.message: This plugin's source repository is no longer available. You may need to reinstall it from its repository, or re-add the repository.

InstallerNoServiceOfficialPluginBody.message: This plugin is no longer being maintained. It will still work, but there will be no further updates and you can't reinstall it.

InstallerNoServiceThirdPluginBody.message: This plugin is no longer being serviced by its source repo. You may have to look for an updated version in another repo.

InstallerNoServiceThirdCrossUpdatePlugin.message: This plugin is no longer being serviced by its source repo. An update is available and will update it to a version from the official repository.

InstallerLoadFailedPluginBody.message: This plugin failed to load. Please contact the author for more information.

InstallerBannedPluginBody.message: This plugin was automatically disabled due to incompatibilities and is not available.

InstallerPolicyPluginBody.message: Plugin loads for this type of plugin were manually disabled.

InstallerProfilesNotSupported.message: This plugin does not support collections

InstallerNotifyForErrors.message: Show Dalamud notifications when this plugin is creating errors

InstallerDeletePluginRestricted.message: Cannot delete right now - please restart the game.

InstallerDeletePluginLoaded.message: Disable this plugin before deleting it.

InstallerLoadUnloadFailedTooltip.message: Plugin load/unload failed, please restart your game and try again.

InstallerUnloadNeedsToBeInDefault.message:
This plugin is in one or more collections. If you want to enable or disable it, please do so by enabling or disabling the collections it is in.
If you want to manage it manually, remove it from all collections.

InstallerUnloadNeedsToBeInSingleProfile.message:
This plugin is in more than one collection. If you want to enable or disable it, please do so by enabling or disabling the collections it is in.
If you want to manage it here, make sure it is only in a single collection.

InstallerButtonSafeModeTooltip.message: Cannot enable plugins in safe mode.

InstallerSingleProfileDisabled.message:
The collection '{0}' which contains this plugin is disabled.
Please enable it in the collections manager to toggle the plugin individually.

NotificationsUpdatesInstalled.message:
Updates for {0} of your plugins were installed.

{1}

UpdateModalUpdateAvailable.message:
An update for "{0}" is available.
Do you want to update it before enabling?
Updates will fix bugs and incompatibilities, and may add new features.

InstallerContactAuthor.message: Please restart your game and try again. If this error occurs again, please contact the plugin author.

InstallerDeleteConfigFail.message:
Failed to reset the plugin {0}.

The plugin may not support this action. You can try deleting the configuration manually while the game is shut down - please see the FAQ.

InstallerUpdaterFatal.message:
Failed to update plugins.
Please restart your game and try again. If this error occurs again, please complain.

InstallerProfileApplyFail.message:
Failed to process collections.
Please restart your game and try again. If this error occurs again, please complain.

InstallerUpdaterFail.message:
Failed to update {0} plugins.
Please restart your game and try again. If this error occurs again, please complain.

InstallerUpdaterFailPartial.message:
Updated {0} plugins, failed to update {1}.
Please restart your game and try again. If this error occurs again, please complain.

InstallerFeedbackInfo.message: You can send feedback to the developer of "{0}" here.

InstallerFeedbackHasUpdate.message: A new version of this plugin is available, please update before reporting bugs.

InstallerFeedbackContactAnonymousWarning.message:
No response will be forthcoming.
Untick "{0}" and provide contact information if you need help.

InstallerFeedbackContactInfoHelp.message:
Discord usernames and e-mail addresses are accepted.
If you submit a Discord username, please join our discord server so that we can reach out to you easier.

InstallerFeedbackContactInfoWarning.message: Do not submit in-game character names.

InstallerFeedbackContactInfoRequired.message: Contact information has not been provided. We require contact information to respond to questions, or to request additional information to troubleshoot problems.

InstallerFeedbackIncludeLastErrorHint.message: This option can give the plugin developer useful feedback on what exactly went wrong.

InstallerFeedbackHint.message:
All plugin developers will be able to see your feedback.
Please never include any personal or revealing information.
If you chose to include the last error message, information like your Windows username may be included.

The collected feedback is not stored on our end and immediately relayed to Discord.

InstallerFeedbackNotificationError.message: Your feedback could not be sent.

InstallerTestingWarningDowngradeBody.message:
Take care! If you opt out of testing for a plugin, you will remain on the testing version until it is deleted and reinstalled, or the non-testing version of the plugin is updated.
Keep in mind that you may lose the settings for this plugin if you downgrade manually.

InstallerDeletePluginConfigWarningExplai.message: Do not select this option if you are only trying to disable testing!

InstallerDeletePluginConfigWarningBody.message:
Are you sure you want to delete all data and configuration for {0}?
You will lose all of your settings for this plugin.

SafeModeDisclaimer.message:
You enabled safe mode, no plugins will be loaded.
You may delete plugins from the "Installed plugins" tab.
Simply restart your game to disable safe mode.

InstallerProfilesCouldNotAdd.message: Couldn't add plugin to this collection.

InstallerProfilesCouldNotRemove.message: Couldn't remove plugin from this collection.

InstallerProfilesNone.message: No collections! Go add some in "Plugin Collections"!

VerifiedCheckmarkVerifiedTooltip.message:
This plugin has been reviewed by the Dalamud team.
It follows our technical and safety criteria, and adheres to our guidelines.

VerifiedCheckmarkUnverifiedTooltip.message:
This plugin has not been reviewed by the Dalamud team.
We cannot take any responsibility for custom plugins and repositories.
Please make absolutely sure that you only install plugins from developers you trust.

You will not receive support for plugins installed from custom repositories on the XIVLauncher & Dalamud server.

ProfileManagerCopyToClipboard.message: Copy collection to clipboard for sharing

ProfileManagerImportProfile.message: Import a shared collection from your clipboard

ProfileManagerTutorialParagraphOne.message:
Collections are shareable lists of plugins that can be enabled or disabled in the plugin installer or via chat commands.
When a plugin is part of a collection, it will be enabled if the collection is enabled. If a plugin is part of multiple collections, it will be enabled if one or more collections it is a part of are enabled.

ProfileManagerTutorialParagraphTwo.message: You can add plugins to collections by clicking the plus button when editing a collection on this screen, or by using the button with the toolbox icon on the "Installed Plugins" screen.

ProfileManagerTutorialParagraphThree.message: If a collection's "Start on boot" checkbox is ticked, the collection and the plugins within will be enabled every time the game starts up, even if it has been manually disabled in a prior session.

ProfileManagerTutorialParagraphFour.message: Individual plugins inside a collection also have a checkbox next to them. This indicates if a plugin is active within that collection - if the checkbox is not ticked, the plugin will not be enabled if that collection is active. Mind that it will still be enabled if the plugin is an active part of any other collection.

ProfileManagerTutorialCommands.message: You can use the following commands in chat or in macros to manage active collections:

ProfileManagerTutorialCommandsEnd.message: If you run multiple of these commands, they will be executed in order.

ProfileManagerChoice1.message: Plugin collections are a new feature that allow you to group plugins into collections which can be toggled and shared.

ProfileManagerChoice2.message: They are experimental and may still contain bugs. Do you want to enable them now?

DalamudClickToViewChangelogs.message: Click here to view the changelog.
